description:
In order to find the Chinese beauty Yang Guifei, the evil trio head to China during the Tang Dynasty in 745 AD. They find the prince frolicking happily with Yang Guifei but then his father comes and steals her for himself. Yang Guifei expresses how important it is for her to stay beautiful in order to keep the emperor’s affections on her and displays various beauty techniques. In order to get the Dynamond that’s in the hair accessory that Yang Guifei is after, Bimajo challenges her to a duel to see who can become the emperor’s next bride.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima demo Mane Dekiru! You Kihi no Bikkuri Dokkuri na Biyouhou to wa!?
Methods That Can Still Be Used Today! What Was Yang Guifei`s Super Surprising Beauty Regimen?!
今でもマネできる! 楊貴妃のビックリドッキリな美容法とは!?
